Häkke thermal imaging scope. 
Highlights all enemy targets.

Medium-range assault scope. 
Improved optics and range.

Häkke marksman scope. 
Improved optics and range.
Häkke threat evaluation tech. Highlights dangerous enemies and Guardians with charged Supers.
When zoomed, this weapon fires slower, but causes additional damage.
This weapon grows more accurate the longer it is fired.
This weapon has increased stability.
Aiming this weapon increases its effective range.
Increases the reload speed of this weapon when its mag is empty.
Reduces the severity of this weapon’s recoil.
Kills with this weapon increase reload speed for a short time.
The bottom half of each magazine causes additional damage.

Agile post sights. 
Improves weapon handling.

Häkke iron sights. 
Improves weapon handling.

Häkke holo sights. 
Improved target acquisition.
Aiming this weapon is incredibly fast.
Switch weapons faster. Move quicker while aiming.

Oversize rounds built to stagger targets and leave them reeling.
Their mass makes a weapon harder to handle.

Increased Stability 
Reduced Magazine Size

Increased Range and Stability 
Slower Reload, Reduced Magazine Size

Increased Range 
Slower Reload
This weapon gains increased reload and handling when two or more enemies are in close proximity.
Chance to return a portion of the magazine after an assist.
This weapon gains bonus damage when three or more enemies are in close proximity.
This weapon handles and reloads faster when the wielder is the last living player of their Fireteam.
Kills with this weapon grant enhanced motion tracker resolution for a short time.
Readying this weapon grants a brief period of bonus accuracy.
Kills with this weapon grant bonus damage for a short time.
Quick unassisted kills with this weapon reduce grenade and melee cooldown.
This weapon causes kinetic damage.
Increases weapon stability.
This weapon is effective at an extended range.
Reload this weapon quickly.
Consume a more powerful Weapon to boost the Attack value of this Weapon.
